name: There Can Be Only One....Camera Axis
name_original: There Can Be Only One....Camera Axis
description:
Vanquish your foe without being able to see depth, but still being able to move in all directions, and having the camera stuck on one axis. 

Your special power? Jumping. But you are so amazing at it that your boot flies off every time you do it! Be sure to retrieve your boot to be able to jump again.

Select your view at the start of the game and from then on you cannot see depth or change views until you reset the game.
